00027 #include <stdlib.h>
00028 
00029 #include "lnp.h"
00030 #include "lnp_store.h"
00031 #include "lnp_routing_table.h"
00032 #include "lnp_routing_policy.h"
00033 
00034 int id_n = ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE;
00035 net_id_t id[ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE];
00036 
00037 void test_1() {
00038         int i;
00039         for (i=0; i<id_n; i++) {
00040                 printf("lnp_lookup_id(%.20s) = 0x%X\n", id[i], lnp_lookup_id(id[i]));
00041                 printf("   lnp_add_id(%.20s) = 0x%X\n", id[i], lnp_add_id(id[i]));
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void test_2() {
00046         int i;
00047         for (i=0; i<id_n; i++) {
00048                 printf("lnp_lookup_id(%.20s) = 0x%X\n", id[i], lnp_lookup_id(id[i]));
00049                 printf("lnp_remove_id(%.20s) = 0x%X\n", id[i], lnp_remove_id(id[i]));
00050                 printf("lnp_lookup_id(%.20s) = 0x%X\n", id[i], lnp_lookup_id(id[i]));
00051         }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void test_3() {
00055         int i;
00056         int id_index;
00057         for (i=0; i<50; i++) {
00058                 int store_entry_index;
00059                 int id_index = (int)((double)rand()/RAND_MAX*20);
00060                 
00061                 /* lock routing entry */
00062                 int routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id[id_index]);
00063                 if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00064                         continue;       
00065                 }
00066                 
00067                 if (routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00068                         store_entry_index = lnp_key_store_new();
00069                 } else {
00070                         store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00071                         lnp_key_store_delete(store_entry_index);
00072                         store_entry_index = NULL_SLOT;
00073                 }
00074                 routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index = store_entry_index;
00075                 printf("store[%.20s] = 0x%X\n", id[id_index], store_entry_index);
00076 
00077                 /* unlock routing entry */
00078                 lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00079         }
00080 }
00081 
00082 void test_4() {
00083         int i;
00084         int id_index;
00085         for (i=0; i<10; i++) {
00086                 int id_from = (int)((double)rand()/RAND_MAX*3);
00087                 int id_to = (int)((double)rand()/RAND_MAX*3);
00088                 int session_from = (int)((double)rand()/RAND_MAX*3);
00089                 int session_to;
00090                 u_char hash[20] = {3,2,1,i};
00091                 
00092                 session_to = lnp_routing_handle(id[id_from], id[id_to], hash, 0, session_from);
00093                 /*#define LNP_ROUTE_RECIEVE (-1)
00094                 #define LNP_ROUTE_BACK (-2)
00095                 #define LNP_ROUTE_BACK_WITH_ERROR (-3)
00096                 #define LNP_ROUTE_BROADCAST (-4)
00097                 #define LNP_ROUTE_DROP (-5)*/
00098                 
00099                 printf("[%.5s...]->[%.5s...]   [%3d]->[%3d]\n", id[id_from], id[id_to], session_from, session_to);
00100         }       
00101 }

00103 int main() {
00104         int i, j;
00105         sranddev();
00106         lnp_routing_table_initialize();
00107         for (j=0; j<id_n; j++) {
00108                 for (i=0; i<ID_LENGTH; i++) {
00109                         id[j][i] = (u_char)(((double)rand()/RAND_MAX)*26)+'A';
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         test_1();
00113         printf("--------\n");
00114         test_3();
00115         printf("--------\n");
00116         test_4();
00117         //test_2();
00118 }
